mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product (p_name, p_price, p_title, p_content, p_date, p_udate, p_quantity, p_categoryCode, p_discount) VALUES ( #{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_title}, #{p_content}, NOW(), NOW(), #{p_quantity}, #{p_categoryCode}, #{p_discount} );
insert into tbl_attach (uuid, uploadPath, filename, p_id) values (#{uuid}, #{uploadPath}, #{fileName}, #{p_id})
mapper.update: update tbl_product set p_name = #{p_name}, p_price = #{p_price}, p_title = #{p_title}, p_content = #{p_content}, p_quantity=#{p_quantity}, p_udate = NOW() where p_id = #{p_id}
update tbl_attach set uuid = #{uuid}, uploadPath = #{uploadPath}, fileName = #{fileName} where p_id = #{p_id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.p_id, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_title, p.p_content, p.p_date, p.p_udate, p.p_quantity, a.uuid AS attachUuid, a.uploadPath AS attachUploadPath, a.filename AS attachFilename FROM tbl_product p LEFT JOIN tbl_attach a ON p.p_id = a.p_id WHERE p.p_id = #{p_id}
